Do not:
• Sleep on a sofa or armchair with your baby.
• Allow your baby to sleep alone in an adult bed.
• Allow your baby to share a bed with anyone 
who has been smoking, drinking alcohol, 
taking drugs or is feeling overly tired.
• Cover your baby’s head.
• Smoke during pregnancy or let anyone smoke 
in the same room as your baby (both before 
and after birth).
• Let your baby get overheated, light bedding
